attributes.action: Joe McGurk Reduce overcrowding on trains and tubes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Trains and tubes need to have a standing limit the same as buses. At this time trains and especially tubes are so overcrowded that they present a serious hazard to passengers. In the event of a crash I am sure people will be severely injured. Control of overcrowding must be passed to Health and Safety Executive to ensure rules are not broken.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement. Please remove your name from the first sentence.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
